work.name: VivSoft / AIML2
work.summary: Led the architecture and development of ENBUILD, a modular Internal Developer Platform designed to support GitOps, AI/ML workflows, and Infrastructure as Code in secure cloud and on-prem environments. Focused on building practical automation and scalable tooling for government-focused DevSecOps initiatives.

Led the architecture and development of ENBUILD a Turnkey DevSecOps Platform based on Platform One's open source Big Bang. Combining AI/ML capabilities, LLM-powered automation, and secure GitOps delivery for US Federal agencies and DoD innovation programs.
highlights: Designed and implemented ENBUILD as an internal developer platform, combining GitOps practices, Kubernetes management, and Terraform-based infrastructure automation.
Integrated LangChain and OpenAI APIs into the platform to support basic LLM-based use cases like code generation and chatbot assistance for platform users.
Contributed to the creation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to improve integration between AI outputs and monitoring tools like Grafana and Prometheus.
Configured and deployed Big Bang (Platform One) Kubernetes modules using Iron Bank containers, focusing on compliance and security baselines.
Built pipelines for secure MLOps environments using Kubeflow, addressing basic data ingestion and model deployment workflows in air-gapped scenarios.
Implemented GitOps workflows using ArgoCD and fluxCD for consistent, version-controlled deployments across multiple Kubernetes clusters.
Collaborated with DevSecOps, platform, and data teams to align ENBUILD with real-world requirements in multi-cloud and classified environments.
